title: A Superalgebra Morphism of Uq[OSP(1/2N)] onto the Deformed Oscillator Superalgebra Wq(N)
abstract: We prove that the deformed oscillator superalgebra $W_q(n)$ (which in the Fock representation is generated essentially by $n$ pairs of $q$-bosons) is a factor algebra of the quantized universal enveloping algebra $U_q[osp(1/2n)]$. We write down a $q$-analog of the Cartan-Weyl basis for the deformed $osp(1/2n)$ and give also an oscillator realization of all Cartan-Weyl generators.
